course.subject: ECON
course.name: Economics Research and Communication
course.description: This course is to ensure that students will acquire research and communication skills through producing a research-based term paper. The paper may be one that has been written for ECON 4959, or any other 4000-level or above Economics course that has a term paper requirement. The paper should embody the equivalence of a minimum of two credits of workload if it is written for ECON 4959. A standard at grade C or above must be obtained for the paper. For Economics students only. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: Dreamscometrue
reviews.title: ECON FYP
reviews.comment_content:
呢份個個econ dept 既人都要做既project竟然無人打comment :o

其實呢個requirement就係要你係ECON dept既3年入面，最少要做一次research project (如果唔係，大把人剩係揀得功課考試既course)。聽講而家3024 都要做project，不過唔好意思，你個份成品唔可以拎黎交4670。今年為止都要係4字頭Course 先得。

一般既同學都會讀一個course，然後寫一篇paper既。不過，每個course要求都唔同，實際上你可以點揀呢?

你會見到ECON dept既網上面有寫明，有*/# 符號既都同4670有關，但我覺得呢個分法有D誤導 (應該係因為部分course改過syllabus)，我會咁分:

1.
揀本身有Paper requirement，而又有 */# 既course (e.g. ECON4274 R programming, ECON4474 HK Economy): 呢類既Course本身既syllabus已經要求同學寫一份report，你完成呢個course，篇paper又唔係差到無得救既，都會pass你。唔同course對group formation, 長度都有唔同要求。

2.
揀本身有presentation，而又有 */# 既course (e.g. ECON4434 Development, Amber Li 既 ECON4364 In-trade): 呢類course本身既syllabus要求同學做一次present，但係唔洗交paper，咁你4670要做既野，就係根據你既group project presentation去寫一篇paper，通常叫你Winter / Summer交。同樣，篇paper唔係差到無得救既，唔覺得會F你。唔同course對group formation, 長度都有唔同要求。

3.
揀本身syllabus無任何Group Project，而又有 */# 既course (e.g. ECON4304 Time Series, ECON4254 Law): 呢類既course原本係唔洗分組project既，如果你要做4670，就係prof比你既一堆題目入面揀一條做，聽番唔少都要求Individual Research Paper。

揀咩course就睇你自己既專長興趣啦，
如果你Stat好唔得，但走去揀ECON4304 做time series regression既，咁神仙都救你唔到啦。

比個參考大家，一直以黎比較多人做paper既course有:
1. ECON4254: 偏文字，對數學既要求較少
2. ECON4274: 用R做個research project，岩數學同電腦奇才 (至於個course係點就去睇下d comment 啦)
3. ECON4364: 可以分組做，比較少見。Prof 好好人
3. ECON4474: 最多人揀，比較同我地相關，範圍都好廣。

有人會自己搵Prof做Independent Study，咁就自己同Prof傾啦。
